text: @tedcruz Who cares. You are representing Texas.  Stick with the problems that we have in Texas.  Governor Cuomo has offer help to the states that are now have coronavirus problems.  I believe Texas did not offer help to NY.  In fact you wanted New York to file bankruptcy.
